whitepaper.title: An identification and privacy solution that revolutionizes polling, surveying and election processes
whitepaper.text: With the progress in cryptographic technologies, including Zero-Knowledge proofs for enhanced privacy, and the Blockchain as an immutable and decentralized system immune to tampering and attacks, we can now develop the first fully decentralized tools that are free from coercion. Empowering people to voice their opinions despite modern social and political challenges.

how-to.title: How it works
how-to.step-1-desc: When you scan your document, it creates a random ID right on your device, ensuring no personal data ever leaves your phone for complete privacy.
how-to.step-2-desc: The system generates a special 'voting pass' for you, keeping your identity private and preventing multiple votes.
how-to.step-3-desc: Cast your vote anonymously; it's securely recorded on the blockchain, making it tamper-proof and non traceable.
how-to.step-4-desc: Once voting ends, results are available on the blockchain for anyone to see, ensuring immutability and no single-party control.
